actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide hospital and medical services under title 38 to certain individuals who served in the Yugoslavian armed forces during World War I or World War II.

summary.text: Entitles to hospital care and medical services any person who served during World War I or World War II as a member of any armed force of the Government of Yugoslavia in armed conflict with an enemy of the United States and who has been a citizen of the United States for at least ten years.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide hospital and medical services under title 38 to certain individuals who served in the Yugoslavian armed forces during World War I or World War II.
